member.name: T:Mediachase.Data.Provider.Internal.ObjectWrapper`1
member.summary:
This type/member supports the EPiServer infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Generic wrapper class. Can be used when inserting an item into cache, allowing to insert null items. Null items can be used for no-hit caching, and the recommendation is then to reuse the same instance for all no-hits to avoid instantiating many objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new empty instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating this instance wraps a value or not.

member.summary: Gets the wrapped value.

member.remarks: The same instance is used for all calls for the same type.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.TransactionScope.OpenConnection(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.String,Mediachase.Data.Provider.TransactionScope.ConnectionDelegate)
member.summary: Assigns a connection and a transaction to the specified database command. The connection and transaction will be reused if there is a transaction in progress on the specified database.
member.param: The connection string of the target database.
A delegate for creating database connections.
member.returns: True if a new connection was created, otherwise false.
member.remarks: If true is returned, the caller will be reponsible for closing the database connection.
